section.name: uuids
section.p:
Jadabs Bundle Loader resolves the dependencies between bundles. The bundle that is to be loaded is defined by it's uuid (universal unique identifyer) that can easily derived from the bundle's properties:
bundle-group + ":" + bundle-name + ":" + bundle-version + ":" + idtype
So the uuid for the bundle "jxme-osgi-0.7.1" is jadabs:jxme-osgi:0.7.1:jar while the uuid for the corresponding obr file is jadabs:jxme-osgi:0.7.1:obr. Compliant to the maven repository format, it is expected that the location of the bundle in a repository is repopath/group-name/jars/ and the obr is in repopath/group-name/obrs.
